name: Freedocast
overview:
Freedocast is the fastest growing web broadcasting internet portal, with a user base growing every day. With its dynamically adapting video streams to address different user needs, it has a visitor base of more than 20 million per month. The portal was created in Nov 2008; which is based in Atlanta, GA.

Freedocast allows members to broadcast live, schedule broadcasts, integrate video and text chat with multiple participants. Partnered with globaltakeoff.net an online advertising network, Freedocast lets its broadcasters, advertise on their live broadcasts to generate income through its Ad Revenue sharing program. Freedocast created Express Freedocast; a new platform for its enterprise customers who prefer a secured, personalized and independent broadcasting media for official communications.
